tracking.WIDGETS_TRACKING_BODY: Track your cargo with your bill of lading, quote or reference number

pricing.WIDGETS_PRICING_BODY: First choose from to where, then select container or partial and see the freight instantly

widgets.WIDGETS_BILL_OF_LADING_NUMBER_MESSAGE: Please enter bill of lading number

first.SERVICES_SECTION_FIRST_BODY: Our expert staff in maritime transport is as close as a phone call in matters such as pre-carriage, final carriage, port charges, competitive freight you may need for your shipments from and to Ambarlı, Izmit, Gemlik, Izmir Mersin, and Iskenderun. In addition, our personnel working in our vehicles in the field are integrated in real-time through the mobile application running in our company infrastructure.

second.SERVICES_SECTION_SECOND_BODY: The number of partial destinations we serve from Ambarlı is approximately 300. Some shipments need expert touch (Barrel, Liquid, Dangerous..) are combined with experience, it is possible to achieve more successful works. The data in our real-time ship program, which we publish below, is presented via API technology from our application server and can be followed instantly.

third.SERVICES_SECTION_THIRD_BODY: Flat Rack Container, Open TOP container, Dangerous Goods Transportation (IMCO), and Refrigerated Container (Reefer) shipments require expertise, and small differences are hidden in the details. One of our customer representatives who will guide you correctly will do their best to deliver the goods you have produced with a lot of effort to your customer in the best condition.

fourth.SERVICES_SECTION_FOURTH_BODY: With our experience of more than 25 years and our wide agency network, the expenses such as pre-carriage, load port charges, final transportation, and warehouse costs needed for your door-to-door shipments will be at your fingertips before being sent. All you have to do is to monitor whether the transport process is going as planned. The process was never so simple as online tracking.

header.ABOUT_SECTION_DESCRIPTION: Midas Global Logistics is a logistics company based in Istanbul, which was established in 1996, and specialized in maritime partial transportation. From the main ports of Turkey, Istanbul/Ambarli (Kumport, Marport, Mardaş), Kocaeli (Evyap, Derince, DP Port), Bursa/Gemlik, Izmir (Alsancak, Aliağa), Mersin, Iskenderun, Antalya, and Trabzon; Full container service to the Far East, North America, South America, Middle East, Far East, Mediterranean and African ports.  Morocco, Algeria, Tunisia, Libya, Egypt, Lebanon, Israel, Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates, Sri Lanka, Spain, United States, and It provides partial service to Singapore. Project transportation, fair transportation, partial, container transfer, and cross transportation are our areas of expertise. We have our own offices in Istanbul Mecidiyeköy headquarters, Beylikdüzü, and Zhuhai, China. Midas Global Logistics is Turkey's first digital freight forwarder that implements applications that require digital infrastructures such as e-Booking and e-Navlun, and it is Turkey's flag carrier local company in digitalization.

privacy.PRIVACY_TEXT: By clicking "Accept Cookies", you agree Midas Global Logistics can store cookies on your device and disclose information in accordance with our Cookie Policy.
